title: Heave Ho
lyrics:
Way up there
They think they found
A world for us
To settle down
And I know now
We failed somehow



Pick my feet

Up from the ground

The hills have rolled into the clouds

And callous faces

Line the alleyways

Where I long for you



It is no revolution

See

It always has been you and me

In the garden in the photo

Trying to find common ground



And she sings to me

When I'm wound

"Lovely sound

Rows away

We can love this sound

Goes away"



Way up there

They think they found

A world for us

To settle down

And I know now

We failed somehow



Pick my feet

Up from the ground

The hills have rolled into the clouds

And callous faces

Line the alleyways

Where I long for you

(Rose and [...] for you)?



It is no revolution

See

It always has been you and me

In the garden in the photo

Trying to find common ground



And she sings to me

When I'm round

"We found lovely sound

Rows away

We can love this sound

Goes away"
